bill.summary:
Promoting United States Hegemony By Attacking China's Kleptomania Act or the PUSHBACK Act
This bill states that the United States rejects China's claims concerning certain islands and territories in the East and South China Seas, including the Senkaku Islands and the Spratly Islands.
